head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials FINNEGAN, LAWRENCE J., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials FINNEGAN, LAWRENCE J., JR.

block.p: FINNEGAN-Lawrence J., Jr. One year ago, you were taken from family and friends who miss you very much and think of you often. I especially miss you more than words can describe. My heart aches without you and I cherish my memories of us. I miss you every day and will love you forever. You are always in my heart. Forever yours. Your loving wife, Jackie
